filters.name: sequenced
filters.description: These tree samples have had some amount of sequencing performed on them but not necessarily genotyped
filters.query: select count() from 1AV4s_xvk7OQUMCvxoKjnduw3DjahoRjjKM9eAj8 where 'sequenced' not equal to 'No'

filters.name: genotyped
filters.description: These tree samples have been genotyped by SNPs and/or other genetic markers
filters.query: select count() from 1AV4s_xvk7OQUMCvxoKjnduw3DjahoRjjKM9eAj8 where 'genotyped' not equal to 'No'

filters.name: phenotyped
filters.description: These tree samples have had phenotypes assessed for them
filters.query: select count() from 1AV4s_xvk7OQUMCvxoKjnduw3DjahoRjjKM9eAj8 where 'phenotype' not equal to ''

filters.name: exact_gps
filters.description: Each tree sample is independently georeferenced

filters.name: approx_gps
filters.description: Georeferenced sites with one to many tree samples
